summary: This is an invitation from ECPAT-USA for a virtual discussion about Jeffrey Epstein, featuring a panel of experts and a board member, to coincide with the release of a Netflix docuseries examining his crimes. It promotes an event focused on understanding how Epstein used wealth and power to abuse victims.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Convicted sex offender, subject of discussion

events.title: ECPAT-USA Discussion on Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A virtual panel discussion featuring experts to examine how Jeffrey Epstein used his wealth and power to carry out sexual abuse, coinciding with a Netflix docuseries release.

keyFacts: The document is an invitation for a public discussion hosted by ECPAT-USA about Jeffrey Epstein, titled 'Filthy Rich'.
The discussion is tied to a Netflix docuseries that examines how Epstein used his wealth and power to carry out sexual abuse.
ECPAT-USA's stated mission is to protect children from sexual exploitation and trafficking, framing the event within that context.
The event features a panel of experts including a director, a psychologist, and a board member, moderated by the organization's executive director.
